overview: Anna is a beautiful,fiercely independent blind woman. Due to financial problems her husband Carl has to sell the apartment they lived in. They move in an old house in a remote location surrounded by fields. Anna is not happy there and feels even more isolated as she is most of the time all aloneâ€¦ but eery noises and strange facts lead her to think that someone is in the house too... or "something".
title: The Transparent Woman
